org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNChannelList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<LCNChannel>
          • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNChannelList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<LCNChannel>, java.util.Collection<LCNChannel>, java.util.List<LCNChannel>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class LCNChannelList
extends java.util.ArrayList<LCNChannel>
    This class represents a list of LCNChannels. These LCNChannels can be searched for, by certain criteria.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public LCNChannel get(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
        Find a LCNChannel by InetSocketAddress.
        Parameters:
        address - The InetSocketAddress to search by.
        Returns:
        A matching channel, null if no matching channel could be found.

      • get

        public LCNChannel get(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel)
        Find a LCNChannel by SocketChannel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The SocketChannel to search by.
        Returns:

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<LCNChannel> getAll(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel channel)
        Find all LCNChannels that are equal to the SocketChannel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The SocketChannel to search by.
        Returns:
        All matching channels, null if no matching channels were found.
